description: Try our easy to follow Nori Miso Butter Prawns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Nori Miso Butter Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 large green banana prawns, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Cut nori sheet in half, then into 12 equal strips. Wrap 1 nori strip around centre of each prawn, wetting ends to seal.
In a small bowl, combine butter, miso and sesame seeds. Brush both sides of prawns with half the butter mixture.
Mix chilli sauce and mayonnaise together in a bowl.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook prawns for 2 minutes on each side or until they change colour and are crisp and golden.
Drizzle remaining miso butter into pan and remove from heat. Pile prawns onto a serving platter and serve with chilli mayonnaise.
